titleStmt.title: The proude wyues pater noster that wolde go gaye, and vndyd her husbonde and went her waye

publicationStmt.publisher: In Paules Churche yearde at the sygne of the Swane by Iohn Kynge],

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and address from colophon.
Reproductions of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Appears at reel 404 and at reel 1401 (same copy filmed twice).
